name: Ornztarbil
description:
Ornztarbil

A game made for Ludum Dare 49

First person puzzles where the ground may fall away. Avoid falling, dodge enemy projectiles, and make it to the end of each level.

Inspired by Lovley Planet. 

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse 1 - Shoot
  • ESC - Quit
  • R - Restart
Tools and such
  • Engine - Godot
  • Art - Blender, Pyxel
  • Sound - Chiptone
  • Music - Wolfram Alpha Tones
Source Code

https://github.com/MagnusFurcifer/Ornztarbil

Windows will usually perform better, but I'm using GLES2 so HTML5 seems to be working quite well.
